short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control YouTube videos across all tabs and windows from extension bar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension allows to toggle youtube videos that are playing across tabs and windows from the extension. It can skip the ads that are skippable without any time wait.
